channel.title: Dodian Source Development Team
channel.description:
Hello I'm launching A New Server Soon. I'm Searching For more Coders to Make This Project A Sucess. To Let You Know You Will Be Coding On Devolution Dodian v7 Server Base. If I See Improvment In My project We Will negotiate Payment. All Coders Will Be An Official Administrator on The Server And To The Forums. I Will Also Need Coders For The Official Client For The Project. Please Only Apply if you Have Coding Experience.(I My Self Can Code But Not A Master At It)It Would Be Much Appreciated If You Code Clean please To Lower Lag To The Server.
Adding: -Pest Control -Castle Wars -High Score Board -Fully Workng Prayer -Fully Working Vengence -Updated items -Clan System -Updated Npc's -Tzharr Fight Pits -Jad, Kqueen -Godwars -Stable Pk System -Dueling -All Skills And Probly more...
Once I Feel The Project Is Ready For Running The Development Team Will do A Full Server Check and Testing Server For Any Bugs/glitches.
Join By Emailing Me At [email]moparscapeuser@yahoo.com[/email] or Pming Me. -Thanks -Gl To Project
Server Name And Ip Will Be Available After Project Completion ;)

item.title: Dodian Source Development Team
item.dc:creator: @Spectra Spectra
item.description:
@Spectra wrote:

Hello I’m launching A New Server Soon. I’m Searching For more Coders to Make This Project A Sucess. To Let You Know You Will Be Coding On Devolution Dodian v7 Server Base. If I See Improvment In My project We Will negotiate Payment. All Coders Will Be An Official Administrator on The Server And To The Forums. I Will Also Need Coders For The Official Client For The Project. Please Only Apply if you Have Coding Experience.(I My Self Can Code But Not A Master At It)It Would Be Much Appreciated If You Code Clean please To Lower Lag To The Server.

Adding:
-Pest Control
-Castle Wars
-High Score Board
-Fully Workng Prayer
-Fully Working Vengence
-Updated items
-Clan System
-Updated Npc’s
-Tzharr Fight Pits
-Jad, Kqueen
-Godwars
-Stable Pk System
-Dueling
-All Skills
And Probly more…

Once I Feel The Project Is Ready For Running The Development Team Will do A Full Server Check and Testing Server For Any Bugs/glitches.

Join By Emailing Me At moparscapeuser@yahoo.com or Pming Me.
-Thanks
-Gl To Project

Server Name And Ip Will Be Available After Project Completion
